seg-source.mrk: derby.stream.error.logSeverityLevel

target.mrk: derby.stream.error.logSeverityLevel

seg-source.mrk: derby.stream.error.logSeverityLevel

target.mrk: derby.stream.error.logSeverityLevel

seg-source.mrk: Error log

target.mrk: Error log

trans-unit.source: configuring severity of errors that appear in

seg-source.mrk: configuring severity of errors that appear in

target.mrk: configuring severity of errors that appear in

seg-source.mrk: Function

target.mrk: Function

trans-unit.source: Specifies which errors are logged to the error log (typically the derby.log file). In test environments, use the setting derby.stream.error.logSeverityLevel=0 so that all problems are reported.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies which errors are logged to the error log (typically the derby.log file).
In test environments, use the setting derby.stream.error.logSeverityLevel=0 so that all problems are reported.

target.mrk: Specifies which errors are logged to the error log (typically the derby.log file).
In test environments, use the setting derby.stream.error.logSeverityLevel=0 so that all problems are reported.

trans-unit.source: Any error raised in a system is given a level of severity. This property indicates the minimum severity necessary for an error to appear in the error log. The severities are defined in the class org.apache.derby.types.ExceptionSeverity. The higher the number, the more severe the error.

seg-source.mrk: Any error raised in a <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system is given a level of severity.
This property indicates the minimum severity necessary for an error to appear in the error log.
The severities are defined in the class org.apache.derby.types.ExceptionSeverity.
The higher the number, the more severe the error.

target.mrk: Any error raised in a <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system is given a level of severity.
This property indicates the minimum severity necessary for an error to appear in the error log.
The severities are defined in the class org.apache.derby.types.ExceptionSeverity.
The higher the number, the more severe the error.

trans-unit.source: Errors that cause the statement to be rolled back, for example syntax errors and constraint violations.

seg-source.mrk: Errors that cause the statement to be rolled back, for example syntax errors and constraint violations.

target.mrk: Errors that cause the statement to be rolled back, for example syntax errors and constraint violations.

trans-unit.source: Errors that cause the transaction to be rolled back, for example deadlocks.

seg-source.mrk: Errors that cause the transaction to be rolled back, for example deadlocks.

target.mrk: Errors that cause the transaction to be rolled back, for example deadlocks.

trans-unit.source: Errors that cause the connection to be closed.

seg-source.mrk: Errors that cause the connection to be closed.

target.mrk: Errors that cause the connection to be closed.

trans-unit.source: Errors that shut down the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system.

seg-source.mrk: Errors that shut down the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system.

target.mrk: Errors that shut down the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system.

seg-source.mrk: Default

target.mrk: Default

seg-source.mrk: Example

target.mrk: Example

trans-unit.source: // send errors of level 30000 and higher to the log derby.stream.error.logSeverityLevel=30000

seg-source.mrk: // send errors of level 30000 and higher to the log derby.stream.error.logSeverityLevel=30000

target.mrk: // send errors of level 30000 and higher to the log derby.stream.error.logSeverityLevel=30000

seg-source.mrk: Dynamic or static

target.mrk: Dynamic or static

trans-unit.source: This property is static; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change does not take effect until you reboot.

seg-source.mrk: This property is static; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change does not take effect until you reboot.

target.mrk: This property is static; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change does not take effect until you reboot.
